name: MTLLibrary
desc: A collection of Metal shader functions.

items.name: functionNames
items.desc: The names of all public functions in the library.

items.name: makeFunction
items.desc: Returns an object representing a shader function in the library.

items.name: makeFunction
items.desc: Synchronously generates a specialized shader function.

items.name: device
items.desc: The device object that created the library.

items.name: label
items.desc: A string that identifies the library.

items.name: MTLLibraryError.Code
items.desc: Error codes returned by Metal for library errors.

items.name: MTLLibraryErrorDomain
items.desc: The error domain for Metal libraries.
